title: Tran - condition - veram si scierim - Ausonius

content.question: In the sentence, veram si scierim, tacui is translated

choices.label: if I know it to be true, I hide it
if I knew it to be true, I was silent
if I could know the truth, I would hide it
if, in truth, I had known it, I would be silent

content.answer: if I knew it to be true, I was silent
